                                 IAeDeploymentLogger aLogger)
Creates the IAeDeploymentContainer for Web Service and BPR deployments and deploys them via the IAeDeploymentHandler.

Parameters:
aFileUrl -
aBprFlag - True indicates that this is a BPR deployment (bpr file).
aLogger - The deployment logger to use, if null a new one is created.
